custom-action.name: Select GuiTableControl (All items)
custom-action.description:
This action simulates a select action on an SAP radio button, check box, combo box, tree or grid.
Possible parameters are: - objectId (optional): The SAP GUI object identifier. Default value is "ses[0]/". - optionValue (optional): The value of a comboBox. - value (optional): The value of a grid or a table. - column (optional): The column index of a table or the column name of a grid. - rows (optional): The row indexes of a grid separated by ",". Ex: 1,2. - absoluteRow (optional): The absolute row index of a table. - currentCellRow (optional): The index of the current cell of a grid. - currentCellColumn (optional): The name of the current column of a grid. - pressColumnHeader (optional): The column name of a grid. - selectionChanged (optional): If "true", perform a selectionChanged on the grid. - start (optional): The start index when selecting lines of a text edit. - end (optional): The end index when selecting lines of a text edit. - all (optional): If "true", selects the entire grid. Default value is "false". - topNode (optional): If "true", perform a setTopNode on the tree. - ignoreErrors (optional): If set to "true", the action won't be in error if object is not found, type is not supported or an exception is thrown. Default value is "false". - windowId (optional): The SAP GUI window identifier. - objectName (optional): The SAP GUI object name. - objectType (optional): The SAP GUI object type.
